problem_text_cn: 如图,在边长为9的等边△ABC中,BD=3,∠ADE=60°,则AE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the equilateral △ABC with edge length N_0, BD = N_1, ∠ADE = N_2, then the length of AE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴∠B=∠C=60°,AB=BC；∴CD=BC-BD=9-3=6；∴∠BAD+∠ADB=120°∵∠ADE=60°,∴∠ADB+∠EDC=120°∴∠DAB=∠EDC,又∵∠B=∠C=60°,∴△ABD∽△DCE,则\frac{AB}{BD}=\frac{DC}{CE},即\frac{9}{3}=\frac{6}{CE},解得:CE=2,故AE=AC-CE=9-2=7．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的判定和性质以及等边三角形的性质,根据等边三角形的性质证得△ABD∽△DCE是解答此题的关键．
